name: GGJ 2022 - Cattu's Dream
description:
Game made for the Global Game Jam 2022 at the Toulouse Game Dev spot.
https://globalgamejam.org/2022/games/cattus-dream-6

Cattu's Dream

Cattu is a creative cat who's dreaming about crazy things! In her dreams she become an adventurer cat who can walk and jump and discover a wonderful place fulfilled of cat's stuff. But bad clouds looking like a huge cat are chasing her, looking to freehug Cattu. Thanks to the tetrominos and the duality of the vision in this world, Cattu will be able to progress from platform to platform but be aware of the paws waiting to grab you.

Credits
  • Music and SFX: BENNGVOLT - SoundCloud
  • Arts, narrative design and Level Design: Oulfoura "Kelly Cohen" on ArtStation
  • Arts and animations: Lunedegivre on ArtStation
  • Programming stuff and Streaming: Inateno on Twitter
